[color="#FF0000"][size="4"]WORK DONE: ok firstly what a pain this was ..i firstly fixed up the brightness,contrast and value...then it was on to the colors which looked horrible i leveled with the rgb and the gamma and the hue..after getting the right colors and everything looked good enough i then went on and increased the hsv..after that i sharpened it up a tad and then used a smoothening filter but a very weak 1 didnt want it to bee too strong...and that is it enjoy
[/size][/color]
